title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shows zero concern for the Boston Celtics dropping 2-1 to the Miami Heat, Kevin Durant is a strong warning sign to all superstars when leaving a hall of fame team, Luka Doncic is starting to become too ball dominate, and another riveting Monday edition of "Where Colin was Right and Wrong!"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
